title: Dashboard
description: Real-time overview of your practice performance and key metrics
overview: The Dashboard provides a comprehensive command center for your legal practice. It displays real-time metrics, pending tasks, upcoming deadlines, performance analytics, and quick access to common operations. Customizable widgets and role-based views ensure you see the most relevant information for your responsibilities.
